title: Superbad
content:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0829482/]IMDB[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MNpoTxeydiY]Trailer[/url]

I just saw this yesterday afternoon, and found it exceptional. Hilarity ensues, but it still manages to adhere to a well-designed storyline. Right up there as one of my favourite movies of the year.

Has anybody else seen it?

title: Re: Superbad
content:
Ah, this one. At first I thought it'd be something I wouldn't see, but now after your post I'm looking at it with new eyes... Perhaps I could go to see it, I'd like to see a fun movie for a change. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Superbad
content: Best comedy I've seen in a looooong time.
